tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,
review:
We stay at Yeshwanthpur and started searching for doctors in practo near proximity. We tried consulting 5 doctors to find the right one. Based on the feedback in practo, our conversation with her, care taking nature and data of practo such as her super strong recommendation, reviews ( count and recency) we chose her for pregnancy. I can say now that the decision to consult her was extremely right.  

My feedback on her care is; she raises in her customer obsession, **************** and capability in taking right judgement. We have seen at least 8 gynaecologist in Gujarat,  Bangalore (Marathahalli and Rajajinagar suburbs) *** *** ** *** *****

We always have consulted at her own clinic rather the hospitals she visits. Timings are very comfortable. We got very good personalized experience over there. Unlike big hospitals, you can save a lot of time and struggle to find the places and dealing with queues ( I got fed up previously). Also the place is in proximity of diagnostic labs and imaging centers. Her consultation charges are quite reasonable and worth of each penny. I found her highly professional and  prescribe right and only required medication and scans.

Actually we took her advice for second kid on prepragnancy. She always provided us sufficient time. Takes notes, listen well and answers all queries. Provides adequate time for case descriptions and checkup. Handle patient awesomely with both positive and negative motivation at the right time. Have some patience and you can see the best judgement and command over the advises and consultation. She strictly follows ethics and taken right trade off considering risks and suggested vaginal or c-section for delivery. I would strongly suggest you to save brain and just follow what she says. 

Today my wife successfully delivered the baby at late night (at 11.35). Delivery was super smooth. Post delivery, she didn’t rush to go home despite of late night. She did post operating checks. She also had a check over baby and if that gets mother’s feeding or not etc. This is exceptional and give you trust on having your wife and baby in right hand. 

I would also like to thank Practo for super reliable platform for finding such doctors. If practo allows, will have an update after a week with more details. Till the date, I am 200% satisfied and strongly recommended to consult her without any dilemma.
reply_text: Thanks for the feedback. This motivates me more

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,
review:
When we got to know I am pregnant, first thing we did was to try finding a good gynecologist and thanks to Practo that it helped us find Dr. Bhanu B T. :) Many of our friends suggested us not to go with just the reviews, but both Practo and Dr. Bhanu proved them wrong. She provided us the best care and attention throughout my pregnancy.

From the day 1 of my visit with her, I never felt talking to a stranger. The doctor is very friendly, kind, caring, has lots of patience, listens to all your silly questions and answers all of them in the way you can understand. She prescribes right things at the right time. No unnecessary scans; no unnecessary blood tests. At the same time, never missed any necessary scans or tests. She has done the best that my baby and I need. I am very thankful to the Doctor for being very supportive throughout my journey of pregnancy.

Whenever I get worried of some pregnancy symptoms, the doctor was always there to support and clarify what it is and why I have got. Every consultation with her was a very good experience, that when leaving her clinic, I come out very lighthearted. 

I was desperate to have normal delivery and Dr.Bhanu made my dream come true. From the time I got admitted in the hospital, the doctor was always there whenever required giving her personal attention. For every 2 hours, she was following up with the nursing staff even at the midnight. Next day, early in the morning, she was right there at the hospital to check on the progress. Every minute of my labor, doctor was there next to me, with her motivational words. She made me feel safe, cared for, and comfortable. 

The confidence she gave me on the labor bed was phenominal. She spent more than 2 hours standing next to me in the labor room helping me deliver the baby safe. She guided me and helped me push the baby right. No words match to express my gratitude for the doctor. I enjoyed every moment of my labor and relish it now as well..  All this is because of Dr.Bhanu's supervision.

Even post delivery, she gave time to check on the baby and mother's feed. She personally called me after couple of days to check on the baby's health and my health (I had postpartum edema - swollen legs) and suggested medications over the call. That is the care she has for her patients. 

The Doctor is a cute little Angel in disguise with incredible ability and potential.

We are super satisfied with the doctor and very strongly recommend her :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
At the very first visit of my pregnancy check i became more comfortable.
Dr.Bhanu ma’m was so kind and with patience she clarified all our queries.
I was still going to the work until 7th month and she was kind with the flexible appointments and so much supportive over the months.
Regular follow up schedules, insisted us to get scannings and tests done at right time.
During this time she did advice me in all the worries  i come across and even she supported after clinic hours and i still i reconcile she asked us to visit for check up at the very early morning when i had a worry and which was bothered me.
My labor-delivery was well scheduled with the consent from Dr.Bhanu ma’m and i had normal delivery which was indeed by Dr.Bhanu ma’m. 
Post delivery ma’m followed up with me many times and visited multiple times to check wellbeing of baby and me.
All i got from consulting ma’m is.......
Positive feel during pregnancy 
Proper diet plan 
Became more comfortable and confidence with regular tests
Normal delivery. 
Thanks a ton ma’m...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We got Dr Bhanu BT's name from Practo, and started seeing her well before I conceived. The first time we visited her for a mild query about planning for a baby and we were quite impressed. Unlike another gynaecologist we had visited at that time, Dr. Bhanu BT was quite awesome and we decided that she would definitely be our doctor when I conceived. My pregnancy journey was so smooth, all thanks to her. We had so many worries and I remember my tension would disappear as soon as I visited her because she would always tell me "Nothing to worry". Throughout my pregnancy journey which was marked by severe nausea in the first trimester and a bathroom fall in the 2nd trimester, we consulted Dr Bhanu BT. *** *** **** ** ********* ******* listening to us with care, giving us support and appropriate advice/suggestions throughout. She has been always approachable, and has profound insights into pregnancy/fetus etc. and could guide us smoothly. We could reach her any time of the day and she would even reply to our silliest doubts. During the delivery which had to be C section, Dr Bhanu BT visited us many many times during the day of delivery, personally ensuring I was alright and provided care & support. We are more than happy and satisfied with her help, and would certainly go to her in case we plan for a second pregnancy in the future. She is definitely the doctor to go to and I would definitely recommend her to everyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visited Shishira maternity clinic throughout my pregnancy for the consultation,After many consultation at the end  now I am here writing this review, 1. Dr Bhanu is very Friendly, follows very good professional ethics, cares for the patient, 2. Does not unnecessarily prescribe medicines,  and treatments , will suggest natural methods to concieve rather than costly treatments, if naturally we fail to concieve only then she would prescribe for the injections n medicationsshe would not also prescribe for unnecessary scans3. If patients do not turn up for the follow up, she cares to check on them if they are alright n doing good.4. initially one month clinic was closed due to Covid, but Dr was very propmt in replying or responding back to whatsapp messages and with the required prescriptions5. My BMI was on higher side as I was obese, with her guidance I could keep my weight gain to minimum throughout my pregnancy, 6. I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes during my pregnancy as early as 24th week, The care n the guidance what Dr Bhanu has given me none of the endocrinologist would have given me, I was monitored for my sugar levels every alternate days and in my follow up she used to check regularly n even if I miss any one day reading I used to get scared on how will I face her,because of her guidance towards end of my pregnancy my sugar levels came to normal values and my hba1c reduced from 6.1 to 5.6.At all stages,  my sugar levels, bp all parameters  including fetus growth were in normal and expected range.I would be thankful to her for all the guidance, care, and support what she has given me throughout my Pregnancy.Thank you so much Dr Bhanu 🙏

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is really good doctor and I would recommend everyone. She is brilliant! She is very friendly taht we can talk to her everything about our health and she will guide us. I loved her service

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I strongly recommend for every one to visit and consult the doctor.doctor very friendly and explains the health very clearly

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I have visited Shishira maternity clinic throughout my pregnancy for the consultation, After 9months of consultation I am here writing this review.
1. Dr Bhanu is friendly with good professional ethics, cares for the patient.
 2. Does not unnecessarily prescribe medicines, tests and scans.
3. Every consultation was smooth and there was not much waiting at the clinic, timing was very convenient for me.
4. Dr was always available on calls to respond for any query.
5. Til the last month of my pregnancy I followed her instructions and it was very helpful. 
Overall happy with the guidance and support provided.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: As it was my first pregnancy my husband and I were nervous when we first visited her but from there on the journey till birth of our baby was simply a joy ride filled with relief under Dr. Bhanu’s supervision. She is calm, gives enough time to each of her patients, making note of every detail in reports, answering questions even if they are trivial. Her timely advice during my early pregnancy on additional supplements kept things well in control. We would highly recommend her to any concerned mom-to-be.

tags: None
review: I first visited the doctor because I read very good feedback about her on Practo. Very truly so. She is patience personified. She talked to me in such a soothing way. So far I have consulted 5-6 gynecologists for PCOD but all of them tend to give tablets that I have to take every day for whole months. I never heard a doctor tell mr that this issue is not much of a worry. Dr. Bhanu has told me to lose weight. She also explained very clearly about how PCOS can be kept under watch by making certain life style changes. She's also the first gynecologist to not prescribe tablets for long periods. ** ***** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** *** ** **** I have every hope that one day I'll conceive if I follow her recommendations.

review: m writing this with lot of love to doctor cos I had a wonderful experience of my motherhoods first journey... Doc Bhanu from day one has cared and has guided to right things and helped me get this journey a memorable one... thru out 9 month's of pregnancy and delivery experience was lovely.. I delivered girl child both healthy and wat was important is Doc supported me to get normal delivery and her advice ... as she was one the visiting doc in cloudnine she was present for the delivery stood by me thru my pains... I and my husb are very thankful and I would recommend anyone who's looking for gynaecologist Doc right person she's is the one.. thank you Doc Bhanu we love you lott 🥰🥰

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** **** ************* *** *** *** ******** ** listen to your entire problems without intervening. She makes a note of all the points and genuinely gives all the possible options/advises. Doctor is very friendly and provides high professional care. Doctor gave us strength and stood by us in our difficult times even at midnight, when the procedure was performed. We sincerely want to thank Dr Bhanu for everything. 
I urge everyone to have full faith on the doctor and heed all her advices without thinking twice about it.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Child Birth Education,
review: I took my wife to her for pregnancy consultation and delivery. Before visiting her, we tried 3 other doctors at reputed hospitals and were not satisfied with the approach. We are very confident in saying that with Doctor Bhanu, you are in safe hand and in this time when medical profession is becoming more buisness oriented she is an absolute exception and provides best possible care. As I saw during the whole journey of my wife becoming mother, she gave us confidence and care. If you want to experience true Medical service and want to know how a doctor should be, please visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Bhanu B.T at kaade hospital, rajaninagar who happens to be a visiting gynaecologist and obstetrician there for my planned c-section. From the time of the admission to the discharge, she was helpful in all ways. The care and patience she showed eased me through the tensions of the c-section that i had to undergo. I wish i had visited her for my first child delivery too. Post op care was calming and encouraging me pull through the pain. I would recommend anyone to visit Dr.Bhanu anyday!!! 
She's available at her clinic close by the kaade hospital and vani vilas hospital too.

tags: None
review: We contacted Dr Bhanu for guidance on first pregnancy after reading the positive reviews on practo and it turned out to be true. *** ** *** **** *** ***** *** *** *** * ***** ****** *** *** As other reviewers hv expressed here she is patience personified, answers all your queries and most importantly listens to your concerns. She only recommends necessary tests and procedures, no undue expenses and keeps things basic. And  another main advantage is it is very convenient to visit at her clinic without all the hassle of waiting for long hrs as in other consulting hospitals. She suggests the sevices of diagnostic labs and imaging centres which are approachable and charge reasonably. She lists down all your concerns, explains the problem and give valuble advice all with a pleasant smile and calm demeanor. I personally had the best doctor-patient relationship with her and i highly recommend her to whoever concerned.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** **** ****** ***** * **** *** ** ****so friendly ,more like family 
I was so nervous n scare to take a call on my unwanted pragnency but she has been like ny family and gave me strength to come out of it and lead my normal life .thanks Bhanu mam

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: First of all I would like to say thank you to Dr.Bhanu for facilitating my childbirth process. Finding the right gynaecologist is difficult during these times. Dr.Bhanu examines thoroughly and hears out the complaints to give necessary advice. She was available all the time during my last weeks of pregnancy and also visited multiple times to hospital after the delivery. She was calm even though I was very anxious throughout the process. Once again thank you doctor for your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Scan,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review: Doctor Bhanu BT has the highest level of patience. We consulted her from the first trimester to baby's delivery. Dr.Bhanu is very knowledgeable. She prescribed the best medicines. She asked us not to go for unnecessary scans. She is the perfect Doctor for pregnants to visit. We are blessed with a healthy baby and mother is doing fine too. Thanks a ton Doctor for all your help, guidance and support.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: I visited Dr. Bhanu in the third month of my pregnancy. She's been very kind and warming to me, explaining all important points and treating me well. Her treatment is fully satisfactory and contenting.  I am having more confidence now over my pregnancy and I highly recommend the docter.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A heartfelt thank you for your advise and treatment during my wife's maternity consultation,checkup, labor and delivery. It gives me immense pleasure to Express my sincere gratitude for all your concernes and making us understand well.Once again thanks for everything..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: I went to Dr Bhanu with high risk pregnancy. She was very thorough in her examination and was very patient with our queries. Her documentation of each and every detail is appreciable which gives very clear picture of health condition. She was always available for consultation even outside scheduled visits. She explained our condition and risks upfront which helped us to take proper decisions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was very Good and explain issues very well. she got lot of patience and understands problems very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
For my second pregnancy i was looking for a Dr near by my mom's place so was searching on Practo and am glad that i found Dr Bhanu 😊
From the first day of appointment only she was very supportive and very helpful in answering all my doubts regarding pregnancy and related queries.
Every consultation was smooth and there was not much waiting at the clinic. Timing was very convenient and even the receptionist was helpful. 
During my labour also she was just by my side and gave me positive vibes that I can do it. At some point I gave up saying I was tired but she was very supportive and finally I was able to deliver normally. All thanks to Dr Bhanu. If she was not there I wouldn't have done it. She is the epitome of patience and that is really appreciable. Am really glad that I found Dr Bhanu and I strongly recommend her  to anyone without any doubts.
Thank you Dr for all your support and care.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words 🙏🏻

tags: None
review: I visited Dr Bhanu for pregnancy related problem. ***** *** **** ****** * I'm getting very good treatment. I visited many doctors earlier in Bangalore as well as in Hyderabad but, after getting in touch with her, * **** ***** *** ***** * **** ******* She has very good patience, listen to our problems * ***** *** **** ********* n explains everything in detailed. Thank you Dr Bhanu :)

tags: None
review:
I and my wife would thank Dr Bhanu for her guidance during pregnancy. Doctor is understanding and comfortable to discuss all sort of problems and explains things clearly with possible test for better understanding with personal care, attention and do not prescribe unnecessary test or medicine. 

We can reach them easily for quick/urgent queries and helped us going through the pregnancy without any stress.  Will recommend this doctor :)

Not only as a doctor she spoke to me like a friend, whatever questions I had she helped me with it. She is a very nice person. Every girl needs a doctor like her.

review:
I have consulted the doctor for my second pregnancy.

I got high blood pressure in my third semester of pregency and i was so much worried on that but Doctor treated it so well, in such a way that baby should not get affected from that.
She will not prescribe unwanted tests or scans.
 Thought my pregnancy journey, She listened my each and every concerns very calmly and treated me so well. She helped me to delivery the baby normally.

I am very happy with my journey under Dr.Bhanu gudience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been regularly been in touch with Dr. Bhanu, since I had a complicated pregnancy. Doctor has been so patient and caring that I felt at ease with her. At 34th week of my pregnancy I had a bleeding Which was quite a scare but Dr. Bhanu handled it so well , she took all the precautions and made sure I had a safe delivery. Both me and my baby are fine thanks to my doctor, words can’t say how much grateful I am towards her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
If you are looking for a professional, experienced, ethical gynecologist and home like atmosphere for your delivery, then Dr.Bhanu shishiras  maternity Clinic is the right place.

She is one of the few doctors who does not give unnecessary medicines or tests and would let things happen naturally(which works actually).
For me she was the doctor who I could trust completely for my delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had our first baby under Dr Bhanu's supervision.  Right from the first day she guided us on the right path. Doctor is friendly in nature and logically explains different phenomenon in each and every step. Due to some complication with pregnancy , Dr Bhanu had taken a quick decision to operate. Thanks to her we have our first baby. Both mother and child are doing fine. I would recommend her, as a first class gynecologist and obstetrician.
